name: Boston to Paris - Telesat Handover
description:
Boston <-> Paris via Telesat constellation
27 orbits à 13 satellites = 351 satellites, 1015km height, 98.98° orbit inclination, 4 ISL links
100 ground stations with 10,000 background traffic flows
50Mbps GSL and ISL link capacities
Extra Feature: 1000ms packet loss during handover
